chatbot.evidence: The complaint mentions the chatbot as a barrier to reaching the call center.
chatbot.description: The chatbot does not provide the option to speak to a person, making it difficult for the customer to resolve their issue.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot by adding an option to speak to a live agent.

complaint.description: The customer is complaining about being subscribed to services without their consent and not being able to reach the call center.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate and resolve the issue of unauthorized subscriptions and improve accessibility to the call center.

meta.review_content: I keep getting subscribed to services that I never agreed to and I always find out about these subscriptions when I recharge. Now I cannot even get through to their call center because of the ****** chat bot that does not give you the option to speak to an actual person. This is a **** network.
